title: Preview: Season 18, Oscar Wilde Short Stories
description: Elizabeth previews Season 18, a premium exclusive that features two short stories by Irish author and playwright, Oscar Wilde: “The Devoted Friend" and “The Remarkable Rocket" both published in 1888. To enjoy these episodes, try The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepybookshelf.supercast.com/.
